title: Sharpening_Tools.dvdmedia
description:
Learn how to sharpen knives and other tools. Sharp tools make every job easier. Your wife or significant other will appreciate your ability to keep a sharp edge on all the tools in the kitchen. You will love having very sharp tools in the garage or workshop. Everyone should possess these skills!

This video focuses on woodworking tools, but the basic sharpening principles can be used on any edged tool. Examples include knives, chisels, cabinet scrapers, turning tools and carving tools, including the dreaded "V" tool.

With this instruction, you should be able to achieve the perfect edge with minimal time and cost, from a razor edge on a chisel to a bit of "tooth" on a tomato-slicing knife.

DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t be dull; be sharp!

Format: DVD
Length: 110 minutes
